Name: The Fall of Pigmote Isle
Description: In the days that follow, Pigmote burns. Pirates note its weakness, and put the city to the sword and torch. In the aftermath of their plundering, little but corpses and charcoal remains.

DefaultEvent.Name: The end of a dream
DefaultEvent.Description: A few pieces of scintillack catch your eye as you return to the ship. You take them with you, along with the story of this place.

ChildBranches.Name: Leave this place
ChildBranches.Description: There is nothing more to be done here.
